wikipedia_page.main: Lyn Sprules (born 11 September 1975) is a female retired hammer thrower from England.

response: Brannan was born in Connah's Quay, Flintshire.  Her personal best throw is 63.05 metres, achieved in February 2006 in Manchester. This is the current Welsh record, and places her sixth on the British outdoor all-time list, behind Lorraine Shaw, Shirley Webb, Zoe Derham, Lyn Sprules and Liz Pidgeon.UK All-Time Lists: Women - Throws - GBR Athletics
